JobFullDesc: We are looking for an architect who will work across Microsoft to help define the technical vision for a new Microsoft user experience and scalable system and build relationships across the division to ensure we deliver on key customer needs to empower them to achieve more.   You will be responsible for delivering engaging experiences to billions of customers. Serving that many customers is a huge responsibility and a rare opportunity. Every single day you will get the chance to deploy code into hyperscale services that power experiences on billions of devices. You will also work with the latest cloud technologies and develop scalable Azure services using a mix of in-house and open-source technology. You will be using the latest advances in AI and ML to drive intelligence into these experiences to make them fun, personalized, and relevant.   We are a fun, startup-like, fast-paced mentality team with little meetings or processes: we like to get stuff done. Our motto is to work on interesting things and have fun doing it! You will work with smart people who care deeply about creating a fun and supportive workplace, and you will have an incredible opportunity to learn and grow. Best of all, your work will impact millions of people to achieve more, and you can be proud to see customers benefit from the work you do.  This is a job with high executive visibility and opportunity for advancement. There are a lot of opportunities for cross group work as well as technical leadership. We are looking for someone who loves that kind of work and is proficient at creating and maintaining warm and productive working relationships. You will also need to be a go getter, a fast learner and be able to work with a lot of ambiguity. ResponsibilitiesAs atechnical leader of our team, you will lead and contribute to the work of a talented group that values diverse ideas, perspectives, andbackgrounds.
